Organics:  The femme just wanted good, quality sleep, she needed it 
in order to perform her duties properly.  She hoped the Minions 
wouldn't pester them too much.
Windlord: Windlord looked his love and said weakly "you need rest, 
my sweet Organics... "
Windlord: winlord opened his eyes and looked his love, wityh a weak 
voice he said "Do you need rest, love???? perhaps we should stopp 
our visit hour in ordeer you can sleep" 
Organics:  "No, I'll be fine.  You just rest, I'll be alright."
Windlord: the male smiled and said"Do you know what happen before 
Malice ran away????...  who may help him?"
Organics:  "Hmmm, it may be the two Lady Minions, they seemed to be 
more concerned about him more than the others."
Windlord: "That may  complicate things..." said weakly the male"Any 
idea where can they be?"
 Organics:  "They could be anywhere by now.  On Venus, Mars, 
Ganymede, there's no telling where they are, but I think they ought 
to be on Earth, Malice can't survive in space like we can.  We'll 
look for them there."
Windlord: Windlord fell in silence and reply "I just hope that soon 
our absence will be notice... "
Organics:  "Me too.  We need Big Bro to help us out of this one."
Windlord: Windlord nodded and looked very tired.
Organics:  "If only we could contact Megatron, this would all be 
over."  She then slowly drifted to sleep, hoping something would 
come to her in her sleep.
Windlord: "But if they caught us... we're lost..."
Organics:  she did not answer, sleep had a good hold on her, and 
would not awaken for a while.
Windlord: the male smiled and squeezed her hadn, she needed 
rest .... He couldnt sleep, he had to find a way tou help her and 
his worries didn't let him rest at all
Injustice:  The clone came to check on the bird boy, and opened the 
door without knocking.  "Hello everyone!  How is everybody!" he said 
in his sarcastic voice.
Windlord: The male looked annoyed to the clone and he didn't say 
anything.
Injustice:  "Why so glum, parrot?  Not having fun?  HAHAHAHAHA!"  
Windlord: "No... No really "reply camled the male"it isn't fun when  
you can't freely walk and in my case, enjoy the nature of the planet 
where I born"
Injustice:  "Well, I guess you'll just have to get used to it then.  
You're going to be here for quite a whilw."
Windlord: "It seems that I have a choice"reply the male with the 
same camly tone"I should be pacient"
Injustice:  "For what?  Death?  Rescue?  Don't make me laugh!"
Windlord: "No.. I wasn't thinking in those things"reply camly and 
weakly"I should be pacient while I'm facing this current 
situation... "
Injustice:  "Whatever, believe what you want.  But don't get any 
ideas, escape is pointless."
Windlord:  "Currently for me, practically imposible"replied the male
